description:
Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted before her very eyes. To make matters worse, Nehelenia’s action is starting to cause a time paradox, which threatens to erase Chibi-Usa’s existence.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El destino se decide en una noche. El sufrimiento de las Guerreros
Le amiche sailor sono in pericolo
Night of Destiny: Ordeals of a Guardian
Unmei no Ichiya! Sailor Senshi no Kunan
運命の一夜! セーラー戦士の苦難
